input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product features and product title below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product title:
Coffee in the Morning, Beer At Night (Periodic Beer Glass + Caffeine Molecule Mug)

Product features:
Periodic Beer Glass and Caffeine Molecule Mug Set
Perfect for Every Day: Coffee in the Morning, Beer at Night
Nerd Out with Awesome Drinkware!
Periodic Beer Glass (16 oz) and Caffeine Molecule Mug (8 oz)
input_text.Response A: Coffee in the morning, beer at night. The perfect combination for any day. These Coffee in the Morning, Beer At Night (Periodic Beer Glass + Caffeine Molecule Mug) are the perfect way to enjoy your favorite drinks. The periodic beer glass holds 16 oz and the caffeine molecule mug holds 8 oz. Made of durable, heavy-duty glass, these mugs are perfect for everyday use. Show off your nerdy side with this unique drinkware set.
input_text.Response B: Perfect for the morning person who enjoys a cold one in the evening.  This set of a 16 oz Periodic Beer Glass and 8 oz Caffeine Molecule Mug will keep your morning joe hot and your evening beer cold.  Nerd out with this awesome drinkware set!  Cheers!

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
